ProblemUnacknowledgement.description: Task resource that requests unacknowledgement of problems, rolling back the status of the problems from Acknowledged to Submitted.

id.description: Unique identifier of this task resource

problem.description: The problems to be unacknowledged, relevant in the input to this task

unackProblem.description: The problems that were unacknowledged, populated in the output to this task

trackingRecord.description: A record of the action taken in this acknowledgement
